cell2d.space

Class SpaceThinker<T extends CellGame>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cell2d.Thinker<T,SpaceState<T>,SpaceThinker<T>,SpaceThinkerState<T>>
      • cell2d.space.SpaceThinker<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The subclass of CellGame that this SpaceThinker's SpaceState is used by
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HUD, SpaceLayer, Viewport

    public abstract class SpaceThinker<T extends CellGame>
extends Thinker<T,SpaceState<T>,SpaceThinker<T>,SpaceThinkerState<T>>

    A SpaceThinker is the type of Thinker that is used by SpaceStates and uses SpaceThinkerStates. A SpaceThinker can take afterMovementActions() every frame after its SpaceState moves its assigned ThinkerObjects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpaceThinker() 

    • Method Summary

      void afterMovementActions(T game, SpaceState<T> state)
      Actions for this SpaceThinker to take once every frame, after its SpaceState moves its assigned ThinkerObjects.
      SpaceThinker<T> getThis()
      A method which returns this Thinker as a V, rather than as a Thinker<T,U,V,W>.

    • Method Detail

      • getThis

        public final SpaceThinker<T> getThis()
        Description copied from class: Thinker
        A method which returns this Thinker as a V, rather than as a Thinker<T,U,V,W>. This must be implemented somewhere in the lineage of every subclass of Thinker in order to get around Java's limitations with regard to generic types.
        Specified by:
        getThis in class Thinker<T extends CellGame,SpaceState<T extends CellGame>,SpaceThinker<T extends CellGame>,SpaceThinkerState<T extends CellGame>>
        Returns:
        This Thinker as a V

      • afterMovementActions

        public void afterMovementActions(T game,
                                 SpaceState<T> state)
        Actions for this SpaceThinker to take once every frame, after its SpaceState moves its assigned ThinkerObjects.
        Parameters:
        game - This SpaceThinker's CellGame
        state - This SpaceThinker's SpaceState
